mapper.select: /* [chn.bhmc.dms.cmm.cmp.service.dao.DealerDAO.selectTskListByCondition] */ SELECT V2.DEPT_CD, V3.TSK_CD ,V2.DEPT_NM , V3.TSK_NM FROM CM_0801T V1 LEFT JOIN CM_3401T V2 ON V1.DEPT_CD = V2.DEPT_CD LEFT JOIN CM_2801T V3 ON V1.TSK_CD = V3.TSK_CD WHERE V1.USR_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY V1.USR_ID ASC
